title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Discrete event simulation and related statistical concepts, simulation of longwall mining and open-pit transportation systems; Resource inventory and orebody modelling; Ultimate Pit Design Models; Basics of Management Information System; Truck Dispatching Systems; Production Scheduling for Grade Control; Blast simulation
